revision.text:
{{codepointer|Special action|Strife|r=Programmer}} '''A_ProgrammerDeath'''
(no parameters)
==Usage== If the calling actor is the last of its type on the map, gives a {{Class|ProgLevelEnder}} to the first living player found and then calls [[A_BossDeath]].
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Programmer}} and derived classes.
